name: Open Mic #1 ft.Fahaz
description: This edition of Open Mic, we have Fahaz Bazil, a 3rd year Engineering Student at KMEA College of Engineering. Fahaz is a great artist and an integral part of our Music Interest Group and its activities.

name: Open Mic #2 ft.Bibin
description: This edition of Open Mic, we have Bibin Jose, a 3rd year Engineering Student at St. Joseph's College of Engineering and Technology, Palai. Bibin is a wonderful singer as well a great artist.

name: Open Mic #3 ft.Arjun
description: Wouldn't a little music 🎸 make your day better❓ Join us for Open Mic at 8:00 PM today on our Instagram Handle. This edition of Open Mic 👨‍🎤, we have Arjun Jaypal, a 3rd year engineering student at GEC Idukki.

name: Open Mic #4 ft.Ramakrishnan
description: This time we have with us Ramakrishnan Hareesh, a 4th year Engineering Student at MBCET. Ramakrishnan is a music composer and loves to experiment with music to create art. Join us live on Instagram at 8pm on the 8th of December and witness Ramakrishnan create some magic 🪄 with music 🎼

name: Open Mic #5 ft.@s_o_d_666 & sabareesh___k
description: This time we have with us George Ben Christy & Sabareesh K. Join us live on Instagram at 8pm on the 15th of December and witness the magic of music 🎼
